results.title: Pilgrimage
results.creator_credit: Stafford Garner and Australian Broadcasting Commission
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Journey into the Himalayas”.
Keith Adam mounts an expedition to the source of India’s sacred river, the Ganges. Hundreds of thousands of devout Hindus make the gruelling journey from the hot, dusty plains of the Indian sub-continent to witness, for the first time in their lives, the terrifying grandeur of the Himalayan peaks which give birth to the holiest of all rivers.

results.title: Pilferage
results.brief_description: The problem of shoplifting in self-service stores. A grocer is seen trying various solutions. Points out that many legal technicalities are involved in direct accusation; that some means of dissuading shoplifters will also irritate good ccustomers; but continuous courtesy and helpfulness will drive away the bad customers while retaining the good.

results.title: Pile Ou Face = Heads or Tails
results.brief_description:
Edouard Morlaix’s wife dies after falling through a window. Inspector Baroni is convinced she was pushed by Morlaix who wanted to be free to run away with his mistress. Baroni starts harrassing Morlaix in the hope to have him break down and admit to the murder.

Credits: Producer, Georges Cravenne ; director, Robert Enrico ; writers, Robert Enrico, Michel Audiard, Marcel Jullian ; photography, Didier Tarot ; music, Lino Leonardi.
Cast: Philippe Noiret, Michel Serrault, Dorothee, Pierre Arditi, Andre Falcon, Fred Personne, Jean Desailly.

results.title: Pilates: intermediate program
results.brief_description: Pilates is an exercise program designed to stretch, strengthen, and balance the body. Poses are systematic and utilise specific breathing techniques that make them extremely effective in encouraging muscle strength and tone. Pilates has been used extensively by dancers and sports professional but is also suitable for persons interested in improving overall fitness. Benefits from practising Pilates include: increased lung capacity, flexibility, improved posture and balance, back strength and muscular definition particularly in the abdominal region. Presented by practitioner Allan Menezes, this disc is designed for those who exercise once or twice a week and wish to improve their overall fitness. Chapters include: introduction and pre-start tips; breathing techniques; starting stretches; hamstring, quad and thigh; rolls/leg circle 100s; single and double leg stretch; criss cross and spine stretch; saw/neck roll single leg kick; swimming rest position; rotation twist jack knife; side leg kick, side leg lift; teaser/teaser twist; side bend seal/hinge, arm weights; tips for pilates. Some poses require the use of props, many of which should be found around the home. Menezes instructs two individuals whilst discussing the poses at length. The disc also contains frequent English subtitles, which pertain to key components of the pose. To reduce the risk of injury, consult your doctor before beginning this or any exercise program.

results.title: Pilates for beginners
results.brief_description: Pilates is an exercise program designed to stretch, strengthen, and balance the body. Poses are systematic and utilise specific breathing techniques that make them extremely effective in encouraging muscle strength and tone. Pilates has been used extensively by dancers and sports professional but is also suitable for persons interested in improving overall fitness. Benefits from practising Pilates include: increased lung capacity, flexibility, improved posture and balance, back strength and muscular definition particularly in the abdominal region. Presented by practitioner Allan Menezes, this disc contains information on poses suitable for people wishing to gain an introduction to Pilates, who may not exercise often. The first chapter is an introduction to the poses and how to correctly perform them in relation to breathing, posture and holding poses. Other chapters focus on: starting stretches; hamstring stretches; thigh stretches; side leg lifts; spine stretches; preparation for the 100s; 100s pose; co-ordination; single leg circle; perfect abdominal curl; arm weights; rest position; and arm swings. Some poses require the use of props, many of which should be found around the home. Menezes instructs two individuals whilst discussing the poses at length. The disc also contains frequent English subtitles, which pertain to key components of the pose. To reduce the risk of injury, consult your doctor before beginning this or any exercise program.

results.title: Pilates conditioning for weight loss
results.brief_description: Pilates is an exercise program designed to stretch, strengthen, and balance the body. The poses are systematic and utilise specific breathing techniques that make them extremely effective in encouraging muscle tone. Pilates has been used by dancers and sports professional but is suitable for persons interested in improving overall fitness. Benefits of Pilates include: increased lung capacity, flexibility, improved posture and balance, back strength and muscular definition particularly in the abdominal region. Practitioner Suzanne Deason discusses the theory that excess body weight may reflect a lifestyle imbalance, addressed through Pilates, which aims to bring harmony between mind, body and spirit. Part one: Creating awareness. Covers several poses and breathing techniques that bring awareness to isolating and moving different parts of the body. Helps strengthen abdominal, leg and arm muscles. Part two: Workout focusing on increased circulation, flexibility and strength for the entire body. Poses include: Foot and ankle work; Leg circles; Single and double leg stretch; Hip circles; Gentle spine twist; Spine stretch; Lower-body leg lifts; Hamstring stretch; Side leg lifts and circles; and Inner thigh lifts. Three levels are displayed to accommodate various levels of fitness - for an explanation of the levels view section one; workouts narrated with detailed instructions. To reduce the risk of injury, consult your doctor before beginning this or any exercise program.

results.title: Pilates advanced program
results.brief_description: Pilates is an exercise program designed to stretch, strengthen, and balance the body. Poses are systematic and utilise specific breathing techniques that make them extremely effective in encouraging muscle strength and tone. Pilates has been used extensively by dancers and sports professional but is also suitable for persons interested in improving overall fitness. Benefits from practising Pilates include: increased lung capacity, flexibility, improved posture and balance, back strength and muscular definition particularly in the abdominal region. Presented by practitioner Allan Menezes, this disc is designed for those who are fit and strong and would like a challenge to their current fitness program. Chapters include: introduction and pre-start tips; breathing techniques; rollup/hundreds/roll over; single leg circles rolling like a ball; single and double leg stretch; criss cross spine stretch; open leg rocker/corkscrew; saw/neck rolls; swan 1 and 2; single and double leg kicks; swimming/breast stroke; neck pull/bicycle/scissors; shoulder bridge; rotation twist jack knife; leg kicks/teaser lower and raise; leg pull front and back; side twist/boomerang/racking; rest position/push ups; cool down/arm swings. Some poses require the use of props, many of which should be found around the home. Menezes instructs two individuals whilst discussing the poses at length. The disc also contains frequent English subtitles, which pertain to key components of the pose. To reduce the risk of injury, consult your doctor before beginning this or any exercise program.

results.title: Pilates a.m. p.m. mat workout
results.brief_description: Pilates is an exercise program designed to stretch, strengthen, and balance the body. The poses are systematic and utilise specific breathing techniques that make them extremely effective in encouraging muscle strength and tone. Pilates has been used extensively by dancers and sports professional but is also suitable for persons interested in improving overall fitness. Benefits from practicing Pilates include: increased lung capacity, flexibility, improved posture and balance, back strength and muscular definition particularly in the abdominal region. With Jillian Hessel and Ana Caban, this video is divided into three sections. Part one: using a chair this section focuses on alignment, light stretching for the upper body, and deep and percussive breathing, essential to an effective Pilates workout, that helps flatten the abdomen, lengthen the spine and support the lower back. Part two: mat workout designed to be practiced in the morning, aims to awaken and enliven mind and body. These poses, seated and upright, improve abdominal strength, alignment, posture and overall muscle tone. Part three: designed to be practised in the afternoon or early evening, this component encourages the user to wind down physically and emotionally, whilst providing a physically demanding work out. Includes breathing techniques, vigorous exercises and concludes with calming poses. All three workouts are narrated with detailed instructions. To reduce the risk of injury, consult your doctor before beginning this or any exercise program.

results.title: Pikangikum
results.creator_credit: John Gould, John Kemeny, Robert Verrall and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: In this film, made originally for theatrical use, the mood of the Pikangikum Indian Reserve in northern Ontario is evoked through snatches of dialogue and drawings by John Gould.

results.title: Pigs!
results.brief_description: Shows the habits and behaviour of domestic pigs, using natural sounds and no narration. Records the faces, personalities, and varied textures of the pigs.
